description: Application under S73 of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) to secure the variation of planning condition 2 of planning permission P2014/5029/FUL (allowed by Appeal A reference APP/V5570/W/15/3032636 dated 02.10.2015) for the erection of an two storey rear extension at second and third floor level, on existing flat roof to extend two existing residential flats 2.3 and 3.1 Cannon Brewery, alterations to internal layout of flats.The variation from the approved plans relate to the external steel fins/columns which have been slightly altered in design and increased in size.
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of [02/10/2018].

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on [02/10/2015) [LBI ref: [P2014/5029/FUL].    Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
